name: Driving Disasters
description:
Gameplay

Driving Disasters is an Arcade style dodging obstacles type of Game. Your goal is to reach your Summer Destination (The Beach) and make it there without a scratch. You can use the A or D keys to dodge obstacles and collect gas cans to make it to the Finish Line.

Levels

Driving Disasters has 5 levels. Each level consists of new types of objects to dodge and new settings to explore. The Levels consist of a City, a Farm, the Forest, a Desert, and finally a Beach!

Credits

Developer and Programmer: Kaemyn Brown
